mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, T.* FROM TBL_SELL_PRODUCT T,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) TMP ORDER BY SELL_PRODUCT_NUM desc LIMIT 0,6

select p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.USER_NUM,p.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE,SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK ,p.SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS,p.SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID, count(r.review_num) review_count from TBL_SELL_PRODUCT p join TBL_REVIEW r on p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM = r.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM group by p.SELL_PRODUCT_NUM, p.USER_NUM,p.SELL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY,p.SELL_PRODUCT_NAME, p.SELL_PRODUCT_ORIGIN_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_PRICE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_EXPIRE_DATE,SELL_PRODUCT_STOCK ,p.SELL_PRODUCT_STATUS,p.SELL_PRODUCT_THUMBNAIL,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE,p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UPLOAD_PATH, p.SELL_PRODUCT_IMAGE_UUID order by review_count desc limit 4;
